sentence.idiomatic: Wearing this kind of classic style evening dress to attend a banquet is the most suitable.
This part is simply marvelous. I feel it won't be long before it becomes a classic line.
When I'm bored I like to listen to some classic old songs to while away the time.
The driving route that I told you is the closest, and it also won't have any traffic jams.
The travel agent's itineraries aren't at all interesting. They are always just taking the tourists shopping.
This route incorporates all the major scenic spots, it's really great.
Listening to rock music live is way more exciting than watching it at home on television.
Car races are both thrilling and stimulating, I always have to watch them.
Playing these kinds of little games aren't at all interesting. It would be more exciting to play some online games.
Nowadays more and more young people are in love with thrill sports.
In his time off, he likes to explore the outdoors by himself.
The expedition has explored this desert on many occasions, but they have never found anything of value.
He is a member of a mountaineering party. His objective is to unceasingly challenge the limits.
This price exceeds the limits that the residents can bear for housing costs. There definitely won't be any market.
This kind of speed is already at human limits, how could anyone ever surpass it?
You didn't investigate thoroughly--just went and invested. It's a little risky.

word.literal: to not own a thing in the world

sentence.idiomatic: Taking all your money and investing it in the stock market is really too risky. If by any chance the stock market crashes, you won't own a thing in the world.
Are you a real man, or not? You don't have any spirit of adventure.
Before I went to India I acquainted myself with the local conditions and customs.
I stayed in Yunnan province for over a month. I was deeply fascinated by the local customs of the ethnic minority peoples there.
This publicity film introduces everyone to the local conditions and customs of the various localities of China. It's really very useful.
Do you want to go traveling? I can recommend some good routes.
That's OK. Do you have some more thrilling travel activities?
You mean the adventure type?
Yeah, or extreme sports, like rock climbing or whitewater rafting. Recommend me some distinctive places.
No problem. Please have a seat. Do you want to go somewhere near, or somewhere farther away?
Both are OK. The main thing is how fun it is.

For whitewater rafting, I recommend that you go to West Zhejiang Grand Canyon. The current is fast there, so it's especially exciting for rafting. Plus the scenery and air quality are great. You can totally relax there.
I'll think it over. How about rock climbing?

There are a lot more choices for rock climbing. But it depends on your skill level and time. The natural outdoor rock climbing in Sichuan is really popular now. The mountains there are good for rock climbing, and they recently opened some climbing bases. It's worth going.
Where is good for spelunking?
If it's spelunking, of course Guilin and Chongqing rank the most famous. But they're all more or less totally developed, and there are lots of tourists, so you can't call it exploring.
That's kind of a shame. So, if I want to go hang gliding, where should I go?

I don't think there's any particular place. A lot of big cities have hang gliding clubs these days. Choose a weekend and just go. It's really convenient. Actually, if you really like to take risks, I could recommend a place.
Where?

word.literal: to enjoy oneself to the full

sentence.idiomatic: You could ride a motorbike to Tibet or Xinjiang. We recently arranged a travel route for quite a few clients. You can go according to your requirements. Sightsee on the road. You can see all sorts of local scenery and customs, and it has the feel of adventure. It's really an experience.
Uh, motorbike? That seems a bit too dangerous. I think I'd better try something simpler first.

word.literal: to enjoy oneself to the full
